title: The Roman Empire and Government Systems

vocab.definition: A large territory with many different peoples under one ruler
A government where people elect representatives to make decisions
The supreme ruler of an empire
A person who belongs to a country and has rights and responsibilities
A system built by Romans to transport water over long distances

teachingNotes: Show maps of Roman expansion. Discuss how Romans influenced law, language, and architecture. Compare Roman republic to modern governments.

sample.question: What do we call a large territory with many peoples under one ruler?

truefalse.question: Rome was first a republic before it became an empire.

multiplechoice.question: What did Romans build to transport water?

fillintheblank.question: A government where people elect representatives is called a ________.
